alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:05PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Custer County through 245 PM MDT... At 205 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Chilly Barton Flat, or 21 miles south of Challis, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willow Creek Summit and Meadow Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
